name: recipe-app-mern
description: A MERN stack recipe finder application

scripts.setup: echo 'Please create a .env file in the /backend folder and add your MONGO_URI, SPOONACULAR_API_KEY, and JWT_SECRET. Then, create a .env file in the /frontend folder and add PORT=3001'
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting the application... Make sure you have run the setup first.' && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
